FuncDef: This command configures the encoding of synchronization status messages. For example, whether to use an SDH or SONET set of values. Configuring the network-type is only applicable to SyncE ports. It is not configurable on SONET/SDH ports. For the network-type, sdh refers to ITU-T G.781 Option I, while sonet refers to G.781 Option II (equivalent to Telcordia GR-253-CORE).

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the values used on a G.781 Option 1 compliant network.
Specifies the values used on a G.781 Option 2 compliant network.
